column1: #Text=It seems commenters here have little knowledge of what is actually going on in FN communities.
#Text=You want to know why there are issues within families?
#Text=Well current parents were not raised by parents.
#Text=They were raised by a residential school system that abused them horribly.
#Text=How on earth could they learn to be parents?
#Text=Now they struggle significantly with the trauma from their past as well as trying to learn what normal parent-child relationships look like.
#Text=This is why lots of FN kids are being raised by other family members like grandparents.
#Text=The systemic racism that is faced by the FN population is very real.
#Text=THe challenges faced by FN youth are also very real.
